course_description: Modern and ancient tropical environments of The Bahamas. Topics: sea level, island biogeography, reef ecology, geology, human effects on environments. Required weekend field trip to Georgia barrier island. Must be taken with ENVS 242 to fulfill ENVS field course.
prerequisites: ENVS 120 or ENVS 130 or ENVS 131 or ENVS_OX 131 or ENVS 140 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
schedule_location: T 1pm-2:15pm in Math & Science Center - W501
sections: Class Nbr: 3188, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 1-2:15p, Instructor: A. Martin, Status: Open
